title: Jennifer Lopez, 50, bares it all in a behind-the-scenes 'Hustlers' photo
text:
Jennifer Lopez’s fans are still waiting for the highly anticipated Sept. 13 release of her upcoming movie Hustlers. But, the superstar singer and actress is giving people a sneak peek at some behind-the-scenes moments to hold them over until the film hits theaters.

Her latest Instagram post, in particular, has the 50-year-old’s fans gushing over her body as she was filming alongside fellow Bronx-native, Cardi B.

The photo, which features J. Lo sitting down in her underwear and an impressive pair of platform heels, doesn’t neglect to show off Lopez’s toned abs and arms. Her followers didn’t fail to point them out either.

“Look how amazing jlo looks. Hard work,” one person commented. Another said, “All I see is jlo in this pic.”

Plenty of others made remarks about Lopez’s age, and how they were in disbelief that she is 50 years old.

“You don't look a day over 20,” one comment reads. “What am I doing wrong lord!” another wrote.

One person event commented on how Lopez’s co-star, Cardi B, is just 26 years old but you “can’t even tell” that there’s an age difference.

Ultimately, fans hailed the two women as “queens from the Bronx.”

description: Fans are anticipating the Sept. 13 release of Jennifer Lopez's new movie "Hustlers." But in the meantime, she's sharing some behind-the-scenes photos from the set.
